price: Ako On hoće, vas će ukloniti, o ljudi, a druge će dovesti! On je kadar to učiniti.
arabic: إِن يَشَأۡ يُذۡهِبۡكُمۡ أَيُّهَا ٱلنَّاسُ وَيَأۡتِ بِـَٔاخَرِينَۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ قَدِيرٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: in yasha yudh'hib'kum ayyuhā al-nāsu wayati biākharīna wakāna al-lahu ʿalā dhālika qadīran
